prompt: Design a professional corporate 404 Not Found page with a sophisticated layout. Use a clean light gray background (Colors.grey[50]). Position a large '404' number in the upper portion using a sleek font with dark blue color (Colors.indigo[800]) and normal font weight for elegance. Below it, display 'Page Not Available' as a formal subtitle in the same indigo color. Add a professional message 'We apologize for the inconvenience. The requested resource could not be located on our servers. Please verify the URL or contact our support team.' in neutral dark gray. Include a single prominent 'Contact Support' button with indigo background and generous padding. Use precise spacing with SizedBox heights of 20, 16, 28, and 32 pixels respectively. Apply symmetrical padding of 28.0 on all sides for a balanced, professional appearance.
